author: Steven Wells
comment: 5 *s! Addicted to Jimmy John's and the app supports my lack of social skills and the anxiety that goes along with having to call the store... I mean.. what if a girl takes my order and she sounds cute?! I'll blow it.. Nightmare

author: zack Huge
comment: Editing delivery instructions or tip resets the other fields.  Drivers arrive and tip isn't included.  Should have a confirmation step or something to ensure accuracy.  Load this on your phone and test it.  You can't see needed info when your keyboard is up and don't know it has reset.

author: Sienna Salyer
comment: This is a simple app to use, and I love it! I am having one issue with it, however. When I check out and submit the order the notes for the order are deleted. I have to call into Jimmy John's after every order I make to update the note

author: Rachel Pierce
comment: Used it 1 time and it won't let me order any more. It says my password is wrong and it won't let me change it. I  tried 5 times.

author: Sherry Klein
comment: App is requesting an update when i try to open it, when I click update App it brings me to Google Play where there is no update to be found. Until it updates, it can't even be used. I uninstalled it & reinstalled hoping that would help, but ran into the same issue.

author: Erika Thompson
comment: Used a couple of times with no issues, then suddenly my default address does not have a location near by. Ordered online with no problem. Just a weird glitch that caused me to delete the app.
What is there to dislike? JJs brings me delicious food quickly and all I have to do is select my order from the favorites saved on my app. It's so easy.

This is overall a useful app and not too many problems. It is a bit odd that it doesn't prompt me to sign in when I open it. I don't realize I'm not signed in until I'm about to place my order. Otherwise it's good.

author: Dyson Savage
comment: Even after allowing multiple days for a fix the app crashes on every order. Tried an uninstall and reinstall and it didn't fix the issue.

author: Benjamin Emery
comment: Awesome app, love JJ food. Only wish when you press the MENU button in the drop-down it would take you back to all the selections (i.e. favorites, 8" subs, ect.). This would be more efficient for those that order for multiple picky people or for forgetting drink it side.

author: Ronn Crews
comment: Quick and easy to use. Never had an order not done right except that one time I ordered the wrong sandwich, but they got that one right too. Great app!!!!

author: Jared Leiper
comment: Sometimes it locks up when submitting the payment. Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars

author: Chris Cancel
comment: I use this app almost everyday to buy lunch while at work app is super easy to use never has glitches and they are always super fast to get me what I order this is definitely a must have app for anyone who likes Jimmy John's

author: Melissa Endecott
comment: This app is AWESOME! Seriously easy and fast. Especially love that I can save an order for the next time making it even faster. Can also order ahead if time for a later delivery time. Makes it nice when you have a minute in the morning and are slammed during the day!

author: Tabitha Gunn
comment: Sometime it stops working right when I've finished my order, so I'll have to  re-due. But for the most part works good.

author: Aspen Carr
comment: The web version doesnt like my address, but the app lets me order. I love it SO much!!

author: kyle ramer
comment: The app is simple to use and put together well.  It seems that it doesn't relay the minor details to the store very well though.  Whenever I ask for my sandwich cut in half or for extra napkins it never happens.  I don't knife if it's the apps fault or the store's itself,  but maybe it can be checked on.
Too easy to make an order! They're  already fast enough. Couldn't ask for anything better.

author: Eric Schmidt
comment: The only thing I don't like is it doesn't let you make a meal, everything is al a carte.

author: Courtney Reimers
comment: I love how quickly I can order!! Plus I donr ever have to call them if the website crashes

author: theedandyman
comment: I'm lazy and they bring food to me. What wonderful world we live in.
Love your App! Especially that I can add the tip, on the App. I don't always have cash on hand, so that makes it very convenient.

I've been using this app for about 5 years now & it's always been easy & Freaky Fast great food, I'm a truck driver & I use it a lot when I'm at a shippers, when I'm delayed getting loaded, so that I don't have to stop to get something to eat, after I get loaded, I just hit the road !!!

author: Matt Shanahan
comment: Great app! I can leave my wallet at home now and still order lunch. PS - Thanks for fixing the tipping issue!

author: Katrina Osborne
comment: Easy to use and it has never brain farted and rendered itself inoperable so 5 stars!  5 stars for how awesome the sandwiches are too!

author: Beefs Channel
comment: Just installed, run app, get stupid messge...NO OTHER BUTTON TO MOVE FORWARD

author: gyula moldvan
comment: What a joke for a company you ask for delivery oh sorry we don't deliver to you town or to your location we then what's the point off offering delivery

author: Julio Sosa
comment: It's very helpful. I wish you would also show the stores phone number after the order is sent for any special instructions or last minute changes.

author: Hunter Dougherty
comment: U need to get a toaster & if people ask for a toasted sandwich then u refuse u should give the customer back their money if they request it!!!

author: Hollie Nye
comment: The app is very easy to use and navigate. I love that I can set delivery times. It's handy to spoil my work crew on weekends.

author: Jace Carney
comment: Just downloaded this app, got a message about the "freaky fast" order button and am totally stuck at that screen and I cannot, no matter what I do to move forward to the menu, PLEASE FIX!!!

author: James Ciaramitaro
comment: Simple to use.  Got this app and a gym membership, going to need it....stupid cookies.

author: chaz hicks
comment: Sandwich was not cut in half like I requested on my order, and the bread was very hard as off extra toasted. I almost cut my gums.

author: Joshua Sheffey
comment: The App isn't as fast as their delivery times but we could never really expect it to could we? <3JimmyJohns

author: Genevieve Mckelvy
comment: I think the app is pretty good and easy overall, but on my note 8 it was acting a little weird when I was trying to go back and forth between menus.

author: Steve Bokmiller
comment: Keeps crashing when I try to repeat an order on my Galaxy S8

author: Steven Arawn
comment: The only issue with this app is now I have ordered five sandwiches in one week!

author: Jane Garrison
comment: Doesn't work on the S8+. The app does not respond
App is easy to use. Stores your favorites so it's faster to order when you're starving!

author: Jacob Judice
comment: The app never works. It always says a network error has occurred
